member.name: IShellItem2.GetBool
member.summary: Gets the boolean value of a specified property key.
member.param: A reference to a structure.
A pointer to a boolean value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItem2.GetCLSID
member.summary: Gets the class identifier (CLSID) value of specified property key.
member.param: A reference to a structure.
A pointer to a CLSID value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItem2.GetFileTime
member.summary: Gets the date and time value of a specified property key.
member.param: A reference to a structure.
A pointer to a date and time value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItem2.GetInt32
member.summary: Gets the Int32 value of specified property key.
member.param: A reference to a structure.
A pointer to an Int32 value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItem2.GetProperty
member.summary: Gets a structure from a specified property key.
member.param: A reference to a structure.
Contains a pointer to a structure.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItem2.GetPropertyDescriptionList
member.summary: Gets a property description list object given a reference to a property key.
member.param: A reference to a structure.
A reference to a desired IID.
Contains the address of an interface pointer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItem2.GetPropertyStore
member.summary: Gets a property store object for specified property store flags.
member.param: The constants that modify the property store object.
A reference to the IID of the object to be retrieved.
When this method returns, contains the address of an interface pointer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItem2.GetPropertyStoreForKeys
member.summary: Gets property store object for specified property keys.
member.param: A pointer to an array of structures. Each structure contains a unique identifier for each property used in creating the property store.
The number of structures in the array pointed to by rgKeys.
The constants that modify the property store object.
A reference to the IID of the object to be retrieved.
When this method returns, contains the address of an interface pointer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItem2.GetPropertyStoreWithCreateObject
member.summary: Uses the specified instead of to create an instance of the property handler associated with the Shell item on which this method is called. Most calling applications do not need to call this method, and can call instead.
member.param: The constants that modify the property store object.

param.name: punkCreateObject
param.para: A pointer to a factory for low-rights creation of type .

The method creates an instance of a COM object. The implementation of IShellItem2.GetPropertyStoreWithCreateObject uses CreateObject instead of to create the property handler, which is a Shell extension, for a given file type. The property handler provides many of the important properties in the property store that this method returns.

This method is useful only if the object is created in a separate process (as a LOCALSERVER instead of an INPROCSERVER), and also if this other process has lower rights than the process calling IShellItem2.GetPropertyStoreWithCreateObject.

member.param: A reference to the IID of the object to be retrieved.
When this method returns, contains the address of the requested interface pointer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItem2.GetString
member.summary: Gets the string value of a specified property key.
member.param: A reference to a structure.
A pointer to a Unicode string value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItem2.GetUInt32
member.summary: Gets the UInt32 value of a specified property key.
member.param: A reference to a structure.
Receives a pointer to a UInt32 value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItem2.GetUInt64
member.summary: Gets the UInt64 value of a specified property key.
member.param: A reference to a structure.
A pointer to a UInt64 value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItem2.Update
member.summary: Ensures that any cached information in this item is updated.
member.param: A pointer to an interface on a bind context object.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise, including ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND if the item does not exist.

member.name: IShellItem2
member.summary: Extends with methods that retrieve various property values of the item. IShellItem and IShellItem2 are the preferred representations of items in any new code.
